expenses.title: Airtable Yearly Subscription
expenses.description: Airtable is used to build the application form and store all application data.

expenses.title: AWS Cloud Hosting
expenses.description: Monthly payment for hosting the application on AWS.

expenses.title: Marketing Campaign
expenses.description: Online and social media marketing expenses for the grant program.

expenses.title: Legal Consultation
expenses.description: Fees for legal services related to compliance and contracts.

expenses.title: Developer Salary
expenses.description: Monthly salary for the software developer working on the project.

expenses.title: Software Licenses
expenses.description: Annual payment for various software licenses used by the team.

expenses.title: Graphic Design Services
expenses.description: Payment for a freelance designer to create promotional materials.

expenses.title: Event Venue Rental
expenses.description: Cost for renting a venue for a public presentation and networking event.

expenses.title: Travel Expenses
expenses.description: Flights and accommodation for team members attending a conference.

expenses.title: Team Lunch
expenses.description: Team-building lunch to celebrate project milestones.

expenses.title: Old Equipment Disposal
expenses.description: Cost of disposing old and obsolete office equipment.

expenses.title: Office Supplies
expenses.description: Monthly office supplies, including paper, pens, and cleaning materials.

expenses.title: Website Maintenance
expenses.description: Yearly maintenance and updates for the company's website.

expenses.title: Consultant Fee
expenses.description: Consultant hired for project management and guidance.
